text: Facundo Peraza Fontana (born July 27, 1992), known as Facundo Peraza, is an Uruguayan footballer. He was born in Canelones, Uruguay, and currently plays for Cobreloa of the Primera B de Chile. ==Teams== * Boston River 2012-2014 * Aucas 2014 * Atenas de San Carlos 2015 * Cobreloa 2015–present ==Notes== ==References== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Canelones Department Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Boston River players Category:Atenas de San Carlos players Category:S.D. title: Facundo Peraza
